text: "I Owe It All to You" is a pop song written by Alonzo, Jim Guthrie, Adam Messinger, and Damhnait Doyle for Eva Avila's debut album Somewhere Else (2006).https://itunes.apple.com/ca/album/somewhere-else/id251443321 The song was released as the album's second singlehttps://itunes.apple.com/ca/album/i-owe-it-all-to-you-ep/id212134596 in late 2006 (see 2006 in music) and reached number nine on the Canadian BDS Airplay Chart. ==Music video== The video is street-themed, with many dancers and Eva singing the song.http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x499rr_eva-avila-i- owe-it-all-to-you_music ==Official remixes== *Hatiras Remix *Hatiras Vocal Mix *Messinger Remix ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2006-2007) !Peak position |- |Canadian BDS Airplay Chart |align="center"|9 |- |- |- |} ==References== Category:2006 singles Category:Eva Avila songs Category:Songs written by Adam Messinger
title: I Owe It All to You
